update goods_sku_reject_log

mapper.select: SELECT FROM goods_sku_reject_log WHERE sku_id=#{skuId} AND is_deleted=0 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1

insert.foreach: insert into goods_sku_reject_log (id, sku_id, reject_result, reject_pic, sms_send, is_deleted, create_time, update_time) values (#{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.skuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.rejectResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.rejectPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.smsSend,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
